snippet: Senate Democrats on Wednesday blocked Republicans from bringing up a House-passed immigration bill offering permanent residence visas for foreigners with advanced degrees.
abstract: Senate Democrats block Republicans from bringing up a House-passed immigration bill offering permanent residence visas for foreigners with advanced degrees from American universities.
lead_paragraph: Senate Democrats on Wednesday blocked Republicans from bringing up a House-passed immigration bill offering permanent residence visas for foreigners with advanced degrees.

headline.main: Democrats Block Visa Legislation for Highly Educated
headline.print_headline: Democrats Block Visa Legislation For Highly Educated
